headline: Pronto Announces Industry Milestone: North America’s First Fully Autonomous Mixed-Fleet Quarry Surpasses Two Million Tons Hauled
summary: LAKE BRIDGEPORT, Texas, January 15, 2026--Pronto.ai, Inc. (Pronto) today announced a significant milestone in the digitization of the aggregates industry: Heidelberg Materials, one of the world's largest integrated manufacturers of building materials and solutions, has autonomously hauled over two million tons of limestone at its Lake Bridgeport quarry in Texas.

content.title: Pronto Announces Industry Milestone: North America’s First Fully Autonomous Mixed-Fleet Quarry Surpasses Two Million Tons Hauled
content.summary: LAKE BRIDGEPORT, Texas, January 15, 2026--Pronto.ai, Inc. (Pronto) today announced a significant milestone in the digitization of the aggregates industry: Heidelberg Materials, one of the world's largest integrated manufacturers of building materials and solutions, has autonomously hauled over two million tons of limestone at its Lake Bridgeport quarry in Texas.

thumbnail.caption: Pronto and Heidelberg Materials Announce Industry Milestone: Two Million Tons Autonomously Hauled in Under Eight Months on North America's First Fully Autonomous Mixed OEM Fleet
